Scattershot:


Scattershot looked to Zardus, slowly standing.  "I can kill more enemies than 
you can imagine.  I can drink a lake of mech-fluid.  When I attack, I never 
let up.  As long as I'm treated with respect for my talents, I will serve 
you."
